sections.title: Shadow Work Reflection
sections.content:
🧠 Shadow Work Reflection:

💭 Today's reflection prompt:
"What am I hiding from others and why?"
suggestions: Take 5 minutes to reflect on the prompt
Journal about any patterns you notice
Be gentle with yourself during reflection
sections.prompt: What am I hiding from others and why?

sections.title: Daily Intentions
sections.content:
🎯 Daily Intentions:
1. Show kindness to yourself and others
2. Practice gratitude for at least 3 things
3. Move your body in a way that feels good
intentions: Show kindness to yourself and others
